summary: Completed comprehensive testing of email/password authentication feature. All 14 backend API tests passed. All frontend flows (signup, login, error handling, navigation) working correctly.

frontend: Landing page loads with Sign in and Get Started buttons
Signup page renders with all form fields (name, email, password, confirm password)
Signup form shows password requirements dynamically
Signup form shows password mismatch error
Signup with valid credentials redirects to dashboard
Signup with duplicate email shows error message
Signup with short password shows error message
Login page renders with email and password fields
Login with valid credentials redirects to dashboard
Login with invalid credentials shows error message
Navigation between signup and login pages works
Test Login button on landing page works

critical_code_review_comments: Authentication implementation is solid with bcrypt password hashing and JWT tokens
Session management uses httpOnly cookies with secure settings
Password validation enforces minimum 8 characters on both frontend and backend
Error messages are user-friendly and don't leak sensitive information

test_credentials.test_login_endpoint: POST /api/auth/test-login (creates test user with active subscription)
test_credentials.note: Test Login button visible on landing page for development

seed_data_creation: Test users created during testing with TEST_ prefix - cleaned up automatically
context_for_next_testing_agent: Email/password authentication is fully functional. Backend uses bcrypt for password hashing, JWT for session tokens stored in httpOnly cookies. Frontend has proper form validation with password requirements display. Test Login button on landing page provides quick access for development testing.

signup_flow.response: Returns user_id, email, name, message; sets session cookie

login_flow.response: Returns user_id, email, name, message; sets session cookie

logout.response: Clears session cookie, invalidates session in database
